game is lit way better than any other game i played i always come back to it time to time and always get a great satisfaction from it and plus it gets even more fun with friends unless u dont have prime :| which makes ur game usually always ruined by hackers and shid

This game is very good!
U now why?
1.There is no toxicity.
2.Very friendly people.
3.Everyone knows English.
4.Very good team communication.
5.Everyone good at shooting.
6.Everyone listens to the leader or the person who says where to go.
7.Very cheap skins. Dragon lore at 0,30e , Prince 0,25e ,Gungnir 0,40e and Medusa 0.15e.
8.Very chill game to play at 4/5 am.
9.There are no arguments between friends.
10.And no one call u retarded,noob,trash and the most important thing no one fuck ur mum
Overall is fun2play

It´s a good shooting game where you can play with your friends online. It doesnt require good pc parts to play and when you get better in it, you have more fun. If you play competitive you can rise in the ranks. Bad thing in the game is the hackers. If you´ll buy Prime then you play with no hackers. It´s good, that you can go to workshop-maps and change your crosshair. If you want to know a good cross hair, then you can watch a video.
